summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the assessment levied for the improvement of Murray Avenue and other streets and avenues, by Trunk Sewer, Local Improvement District No. 3402, on a certain portion of the North one-half of the Southwest one-quarter of the Southeast one-quarter of the Northeast one-quarter of Section 23, Township 24 North, Range 3 East, W. M., which has been deeded to the City of Seattle for street purposes.
